key.name: history-size
key.summary: The maximum number of items to remember

key.name: display-mode
key.summary: What to display in top bar

key.name: disable-down-arrow
key.summary: Remove down arrow in top bar

key.name: window-width-percentage
key.summary: Window width (%)
key.description: The width of the clipboard panel as a percentage of screen width.

key.name: topbar-preview-size
key.summary: Number of visible characters in top bar
key.description: The number of characters to display for the current clipboard item in the top bar.

key.name: cache-size
key.summary: The maximum clipboard history size (MiB)
key.description: Note that this is the maximum number of clipboard item bytes to store, not the maximum file size on disk. The clipboard history on disk may be larger than this limit due to storage inefficiencies.

key.name: cache-only-favorites
key.summary: Only save favorites to disk
key.description: Non-favorite items will still be saved, but only in-memory. Restarting the Gnome Shell will result in the loss of those items.

key.name: notify-on-copy
key.summary: Show a notification on copy
key.description: If true, a notification is shown when content is copied to clipboard with an undo button.

key.name: confirm-clear
key.summary: Show confirmation dialog on Clear History
key.description: If true, a confirmation dialog is shown when attempting to Clear History.

key.name: strip-text
key.summary: Remove whitespace around copied plaintext items

key.name: paste-on-selection
key.summary: Paste selected items into the previously active window

key.name: process-primary-selection
key.summary: Save the currently selected text to the clipboard history
key.description: If true, both the contents from the "CLIPBOARD" clipboard and the "PRIMARY" clipboard are added to the history. For more info, see https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/clipboard#Selections.

key.name: move-item-first
key.summary: Move previously copied items to the top of the list

key.name: private-mode
key.summary: Enable private mode
key.description: If true, copied items are not saved in the clipboard history (be that in memory or on disk).

key.name: enable-keybindings
key.summary: Enable keyboard shortcuts

key.name: clear-history
key.summary: Shortcut to clear history

key.name: prev-entry
key.summary: Shortcut to cycle to the previous clipboard entry

key.name: next-entry
key.summary: Shortcut to cycle to the next clipboard entry

key.name: toggle-menu
key.summary: Shortcut to open the clipboard history

key.name: toggle-private-mode
key.summary: Toggle private mode
